main.name: Atul Kumar Awasthi
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Atul. I have 1 year of experience as a Front-end developer. Curious to explore web and work on as Full-stack dev. I have made some interesting projects using ReactJs & NextJs. My dream is to build software that influences people's life.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working on a parenting website. Which helps to make Mama's lifestyle easier and help to dignose there babies health. Used Razzel to build the web and Vitest for unit testing to improve the SEO performance and web efficiency by 45%.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Building on the client live website, in which adding some features in the live chatBox module, customized responsive UI. Add a feature that improves the SEO performance and user view.Handling server-side rendering (SSR) using express.js. Handle AWS server for deploying code on production and development server.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Built the interactive Dashboard and added some high impact features that improve the efficiency of the application by more than 70%. Responsible for enhancing and maintaining the UI and applications.

skills.name: Others - Redis, Firebase, Vitest, Jest, CS fundamentals

projects.title: Airbnb-clone (React JS, Next Js, Server Side Rendering,  Tailwind css)
E-commerce site (React JS, Next Js, Redux, NextAuth, Tailwind css)
Messenger (React JS, Next Js, SSR, Firebase)

testimonials.text: “Winners never quit, and quitters never win.”
